CustomField.formula: Baked_In_2022__c + Baked_In_2018__c + Baked_In_2019__c + Baked_In_2020__c + Baked_In_2021__c + CAPEX__c + Cost_avoidance_2022__c + Cost_avoidance_2018__c + Cost_avoidance_2019__c + Cost_avoidance_2020__c + Cost_avoidance_2021__c + P_L_2022__c + P_L_2018__c + P_L_year3__c + P_L_year4__c + P_L_2021__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of all savings across the life of the contract
